items.title: redcaptools: A package for working with REDCap
items.excerpt: redcaptools is an R package that automatically exports a REDCap database into single forms for easier use. It labels variables, and prepares dates and factors. Designed for use with the REDCap API, it enables easy scripted exports.

moreInfo.rawText: More Info: Read more

items.title: sts_graph_landmark: Landmark analysis graphs for avoiding survival bias
items.excerpt: Survival (immortal time) bias arises from misanalyzing time-dependent events, creating artificial periods of immunity. Landmark analysis addresses this by resetting analysis time at specified points and comparing only survivors, ensuring fair comparison. The Stata package sts_graph_landmark implements this approach.

moreInfo.rawText: More Info: Read more

items.title: selcorr: Post-Selection Inference for Generalized Linear Models
items.excerpt: Applying standard statistical methods after variable selection is common in medical research but can cause severe bias. The R package selcorr enables correct post-selection inference

items.title: Presentation on Ethics approval: Insights from the ethics committees
items.excerpt: Insights on obtaining mandatory ethics approval for your observational study. This training gives key differences between retrospective and prospective projects, when and how to prepare participant information and consent documents, and explore practical examples that will guide you through the ethics application process step by step.

items.title: Core competences
items.excerpt: Essential knowledge, skills, and attitudes needed to conduct clinical trials effectively, ethically, and safely. These domains are based on the internationally recognized Joint Task Force for Clinical Trial Competency (JTF) framework and adapted to Swiss human research legislation.

moreInfo.rawText: Downloadable Documents: SCTO EDU Core competencies Download DOCX (853.38 KB)

items.title: Development of a validated tool for MedDRA coding in secuTrial®
items.excerpt: Our validated tool makes it easy to code Adverse Events and Medical History directly within secuTrial® databases using MedDRA. Instead of searching terms in the MSSO Web-Based Browser and manually copying them into the system, coding can now be performed directly in secuTrial®. This saves time, reduces manual errors, and ensures that all clinical trial data is stored in one place. The tool is freely available across the SCTO CTU network—supporting more efficient, interoperable, and reliable clinical research. If you would like MedDRA coding to be integrated into your database, please contact your CTU Data Managers for support.

moreInfo.rawText: Downloadable Documents: SCTO DM MedDRAConverter. Download PDF (998.75 KB)

items.title: Development of modular R Shiny dashboards for clinical trial, cohort, and registry data visualization.
items.excerpt: shinytemplate is a ready-to-use Shiny app template designed for clinical trials and research. Intermediate R users can customize the app by enabling or disabling modules and replacing example data with their own. Built as an R package, it offers a well-organized framework for easy development, maintenance, and sharing. The app includes modules for recruitment, retention, data quality, study management, and safety monitoring—providing clear visual tools like plots, maps, flow charts, and reports to track study progress and data quality. Contact your CTU data managers for more details.

moreInfo.rawText: More Info: Read more

items.title: secuTrialR – An R Package for Transforming Raw secuTrial® Exports into Analysis-Ready Datasets.
items.excerpt: secuTrialR is an open-source R statistics software package that makes it easier to work with secuTrial®. In addition to analysing and reading data, secuTrialR performs data transformation for dates, date times, and categorical data in order to reduce data preparation overhead and to allow a swift transition into the analytical phase. Furthermore, secuTrialR includes standard functionalities to show descriptive statistics such as study recruitment or completeness of entered data per case report form for secuTrial® data exports.

moreInfo.rawText: More Info: CRAN Anaconda Cloud GitHub secuTrial Vignette
